page.title: 06Sue Hunt_Woodturner
page.content: {Wentworth}is a very small village with few shops. One shop accomadates a lady called{Sue Hunt.}Sue Hunt is a qualifi ed{wood turner}and has her own work sh op at the back of her house. We went there and had lunch in her kitchen.Th en she showed us into her{workshop}to see how she turned the wood. In her wo rkshop there are two great big machin es which she turns the wood on.The machines each have a large metal plate which spins round very fast the wood fastens on to this plate and when the plate spins she can carve the wood .After showing us how she did this we went into the{shop}to see all the things she had made. There were three lovely{clocks}which were all differe nt sizes. There was also a small tea_ pot,six eggcups and a sugar bowl. She also makes frames for pictures and mat ing frames for photoes.
